title: Business Analyst-Telecom
description:
Experience working across Waterfall and Agile methodology driven projects
Experience working in complex projects & across different technologies.
Self-starter who can lead the way by setting up prototypes for vendor technical teams to follow
Contribute to the definition of the team processes and standards
Knowledge of Microservices based architecture, CICD DevOps framework and associated tools, Camunda based workflow is an advantage.




Prepare system specification document based on functional specifications
Understand business requirements and translate them into component specific designs, provide design walkthrough to the development team, validate the outcome meets the business requirements.
Ability to understand how technology supports business and organization goals & accordingly propose and review solutions/ approaches using various technologies/ tools available in market, based on which the implementation very well fit within allotted budget and timelines.
Regular review of various ongoing project implementations to ensure maximum efficiency and performance from the deliverables.
Ensure compliance with company standards and procedures by ensuring timely review with Chief and platform architects.
Build and maintain strong relationship with various stakeholders within BT Technology and Openreach through regular meetings and communications.
Provide direction and guidance to internal teams on technology front.
Regular upskilling of various technologies (as required for the role) by learning latest developments in the market.
Conducting training sessions and seminars on various technologies and tools, for internal (within BT) and external (Vendor) teams.
Come up with innovative and exciting ideas those can add value to business
Coordinate and work with vendor teams across various locations, while performing his/ her roles and responsibilities.
